text: It was quick and seamless!!

name: Natasha Gilbert
text:
Brian Crowley is my new best friend.  I printed the car I wanted off of the internet. Took it to Brian the next day. Brian stated you will leave with this car today and I did.

Thanks Brian for your excellent customer service!!!!

name: Kenneth Horne
text: My car buying experience at Tameron was the best I have ever had. Highly recommend them to anyone looking for a fair deal on a well built vehicle.

name: Suzanne Barry
text: I was driving a Tucson, leased, and nearing the end of the lease.  I came to dealership unsure of what I wanted to do because, although I loved the Tucson I had not had the greatest experience purchasing it.  I met Chris George, who immediately put me at ease with his calm, friendly approach.  He went above and beyond great customer service as he walked me through the entire process, spending time to find out about me and my needs and actually looking for the best car for me, the price I could handle and the best financing process.  He described the features of the car and instructed me on functions and features that I had not even known about in earlier vehicles.  I am still learning about ways that Chris went above and beyond when I received notice that he had notified my insurance agent of my new car, and even notified the leasing agency about my autopay.  I have never had this experience with the many vehicles I have had over the years.  Chris,, where were you when I bought my first car?  You would have changed my impression of what has always been the "daunting experience of car shopping".  Thanks to Chris, and the GM at Tameron Hyundai.

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to review us, and let us know what you think. We greatly value your opinion, and look forward to servicing all of your automotive leads.

name: Ariel Graham
text: I traded in my 2000 Accent for a 2017 Elantra. Everyone at Tameron Hyundai was amazing! Mark made sure I knew about all of the features the new Elantra offers and how to use them. I got the car and color I wanted at a price I can afford. Go see Mark, he's awesome!

name: Stacey McGhee
text: I want talk about my experience with Tameron Hyundai. I had an AWESOME experience buying my car! The sales person Martavise was so helpful and knowledgeable about the car I chose, which is a 2015 Hyundai Sonata, I mean he showed me how to use all the features and I wasn't in there all day like most car lots have people.  The finance guys John & Seth were amazing and really helped me get the best bank and payment I could afford.  Not only was my service good but the warranties I received from Hyundai and Tameron gave me more warranty, now that is how you roll out the red carpet for your buyers. I was even introduced to the Service department manager and I thought that was really cool....no one has ever than that !!! Another cool feature I have is Blue link which is my roadside assistance etc and I downloaded the app and guess what I can start my car while I'm in the house or in California lol! I have told all my friends/family about Tameron Hyundai because it was a Great experience and I AM LOVING MY CAR!!! Thank you...You guys Rock!!!

name: Brittany Sullivan
text: Randall was nice and very helpful. I love having the added benefit of a shuttle to avoid finding a ride or waiting for hours.

name: Eileen Joiner
text: Tameron's service dept was great! Very professional and efficient.. I will certainly go back! A+++

name: Clay Stephens
text: Tameron Hyundai in Birmingham has now sold me my 3rd vehicle, and I couldn't be happier about it.  The sales people are fantastic and supportive.  Management is patient and helps explore every financial option available to get each customer into the right car.  Specifically, Corey L Hooper spent a significant amount of time learning what I wanted, but more importantly, what I needed.  He was courteous, knowledgeable and a real pleasure to work with.  Each question was answered respectfully and with assurance of trust.  I never felt pressured or pushed to select any particular vehicle.  Nor did I ever feel uncomfortable or out of place.  This purchase brought me in for a used truck.  While normally I enjoy purchasing new vehicles because of Tameron's incredible warranty, this time I needed a truck for work purposes.  Corey went through the available used stock, finally settling on the truck I now know, I truly need.  Thanks to Corey Hooper and the entire Tameron family.  Every person I had the privilege of speaking with was more than willing to help in whatever fashion they could.  I will purchase another vehicle from the experts at Tameron again when the need arises.  Thanks again, and I look forward to seeing Tameron's family of professionals again.

resp.text: Hat trick!! We appreciate that you took the time to review us! Thank you for the kind words, please contact us with any of your automotive needs!

name: Shawn Allen
text:
Everything was great from sales to finance.

First maintenance visit went great as well.

name: Christopher Weaver
text: So I am a consumer protection attorney who handles a lot of autofraud cases. Generally,  franchise dealerships are better than the we finance (and then assign that contract to the highest bidder), high quality imports (except for that salvaged title) dealership. These guys were better. Salesman was a bit shady. Service is too, everything else was fine. Car was the wifes choice.  We told Salesman, I wont mention his name, that we just wanted prices, and after test driving a couple cars he got a hissy fit when we told him again that we just wanted prices.  We settled for a 2015 hyunda sonata,  an off lease for a good price (the floor manager, hes quality folks.) Well, the antenna falls of the car, the lil shark fin thing,  the very next day on our way to church.  Wife paid for the extended service contract tho I advised otherwise , and their service initially said they wouldn't fix it, thinking we broke it. ..we had the warranty on top of a service contract, and they initially said no. They changed their mind after my pregnant wife started breathing fire, and fixed it as a "one time courtesy " as if they didnt have to but were being polite.

name: Abby Barrett
text: Rude staff. They will give you an attitude of you take time making up your mind about buying a car. Something was wrong with a truck and we wanted them to see what it was and we were told only if we but the truck. Would never go back

name: Tom Milton
text: The sales staff was courteous and professional throughout the buying process.  My son bought a Sonata last year at Tameron and had the same experience and that is the main reason I returned this year to buy our Santa Fe Sport.

name: Shannon Entrekin
text: Service took great care of me!! Great job!  Will return..  frequently.

name: Lake House
text: This was the best car buying experience I have ever had, and I have bought many automobiles,I'm 88 years old

name: Linda Caffey
text: Great people in this service department.....Tameron Hyundai!

name: Sarah Fisk
text: I'm an older lady who found myself in bad need of a new car. I dreaded going shopping for one by myself. Had heard horror stories of buying a new car. So I walked into Tameron Hyundai scared to death. I first met Danny Pereira. This young man was professional, nice, and helpful. I immediately felt comfortable and that I had come to the right place. Danny found me exactly what I was looking for. There was no pressure or haggling. I can not say enough good about my whole experience. It was unbelievable. There was not one aspect of the sale that was not easy, fun and pleasant.  The manager, the finance manager and the service manager could not be any nicer.  They truly went over and beyond accomodating me. I can honestly say they did treat me like family!  Also, beside being nice, they sold me the prettiest, best driving car I've ever had, and most importantly, at a great price!. I think anybody would be very impressed and pleased doing business at Tameron.

name: DANA REED-VERNON
text: I highly recommend Tameron Hyundai. Everyone I met was so nice.  I could not have asked for a better salesperson in Shannon Cowart.

name: Daniel Corbin
text: I'm always happy with the service I receive at Tameron. Everyone is professional and serve me in a timely manner.

name: melanie carter
text: Always awesome service! Matt always takes great care of me!

name: Grandpa Plays video games
text: Awesome.....shannon took care of me .it was my easiest and most pleasurable experience purchasing a vehicle .....she did exactly what she said she would do right from the start.....I will send her name on to anyone looking to purchase a new vehicle

name: Juan Whitfield
text: Tony did a wonderful job

name: Leaman Griffin
text: I went to Tameron Hyundai after a bad experience elsewhere.  Incredible car buying experience here!! Everyone was friendly, nobody pressures you, candy and snacks to keep the kids entertained etc. Found the perfect suv and was in and out in only a few hours start to finish! Jon Pettway and his team were incredible and if it werent for them it wouldnt be the place it is.  I would recommend them to anyone looking to buy and worried about their dealer being honest and upfront.  Car buying as it should be!!!!

name: Brian Baker
text: Buying a car has NEVER been a fun process for me until I came to Tameron.  Tameron runs like a well-oiled machine.  No detail was omitted.  If I had one word to describe this dealership it is "genuine".  My husband and I always laugh at the cheesy car salesman and their gimmicks but not so this time.  I left Tameron feeling like these people were people I could be friends with--I liked them THAT much.  There is an authenticity there that cannot be manufactured--they've just GOT IT.  This review is saying a lot since this is my 5th Hyundai and 3rd dealership (Auburn and Montgomery being the others). We both said on the ride home "Is it weird that buying a car was that much fun?!?!" We will be forever customers!! Thank you to Shannon, Alex, Richard, and Walt!!

name: Cass Russ
text: They always deliver superb customer service!! Brandon in the service department is awesome!!

name: Hannah Murphy
text: I can’t say enough horrible things about this dealership. Go somewhere where they won’t consistently lie to you

name: Ann Morrison
text: Very thorough.  Service personnel very courteous.

name: julie sutherland
text: Professional And Knowledgeable Staff. Clean, And Quick Drop Off.

name: Regina Bergfeld
text: I went to a couple different dealerships but none of them even compared to Tameron Hyundai! From the moment I arrived at the dealership Brandon Crawley was there to answer all of the questions I had since this was the first time I was buying a car. He helped me get the best price for my Hyundai Elantra, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Tameron Hyundai is definitely the best in Birmingham!

name: Zachary Hall
text: Perfectly cromulent, I just wish they had courtesy vehicles, so I could drive to and from work when I drop off my Genesis for service.

name: Rebecca Hatten
text: Very easy going yet informative salespeople.

name: Diedra Richey
text: My service is always the best.Joe and the team are super nice and courteous.

name: Shedrick Flowers
text: The service department does a great job of getting the work done timely and professionally.

name: Jenni Kress
text: I purchased my Veloster when I lived in GA so I've never dealt with anyone from the sales team at Tameron Hyundai, however I've dealt with the parts and service guys (Tom Land and Todd Hill specifically) since I've been in Bham and they've always been extremely nice and super helpful - if it's not something the dealership can do, they usually have a suggestion or recommendation. Highly recommend these guys - they'll take great care of you!

name: Steven Ogran
text: Oil change and multi-point inspection very affordable and they were very helpful.

name: Judy Patterson
text: Very professional and accommodating. Get in and out quickly

name: Jennifer Powers
text: Went to car max to get a repair and was told I was under the actual manufacturers warranty so they sent me to TAMERON Hyundai to have some service issues done. .....Had a few repairs done to my car. After the manufacturer’s warranty ended, the holding tank for the windshield washer fluid broke.... SO...I scheduled an appointment at tameron Hyundai just like before. .....I’m glad I called my warranty to double check because tameron wanted me to pay $50 deductible even though I purchased the 60 month 125,000 extended warranty. Service manager tried to get me to pay $50 knowing it would be free at carmax. Yep. Can’t trust anyone.

resp.text: Hello Ms. Powers, we're sorry to read that you feel misled by our service department. However, since your extended warranty was purchased at CarMax, that deductible is waived only at CarMax. Of course we are more than happy to service your vehicle, we cannot honor all stipulations of a warranty that only serves the location of purchase. Please give us a call if you have any more questions! Thanks for reaching out.

name: Susan Mooresmith
text:
Positive experience, other than the Cost of Service, at $141.00 for the
8,000 Mile Service.

name: Gloria Donworth
text: Larry Johnson was extremely professional and helpful as he went way above and beyond to take care of every detail in the purchase of my new Sonata.  Larry should be commended for his efforts to please the client.

name: Ian Oliver
text: Good experience, solid offer on my trade in, can't complain.

name: J FIKES
text: The service manager was rude and a little demeaning. I took my car in for a recall for the seatbelts which states that the links could come detached from the pretensioners and could cause serious injury but when I went in all the paperwork said they did was install a sticker. When I asked if that's all it needed then why say the seatbelts could come detached, he says, I don't know why they would say that and why would I lie about that? Well a lot of ppl lie for no reason. Also where is this supposed installed sticker because I still don't see it on the either seatbelt!!! Such a waste of time. But I did get to meet someone extremely nice by the name of Christina Jowers. Go buy your from her.

name: Alan Thompson
text: Have purchased a total of 4 cars there. Overall I am pleased with them.

name: Latoya Hearns
text: We bad one hiccup there but other than that the customer service is great. We have always been treated well there.

name: Tommy Carneal
text: Great customer service. Cherish is the best

name: Sheila R Tingle
text:
Brandon in the service dept is a Rockstar !!
He went over the top to help me with my vehicle !

name: Keef C
text:
Update - July 2016:
Had to take the same Veloster Turbo mentioned below in for a replacement wheel sensor, and to get a couple of service bulletins completed. Matt, the service manager, did a phenomenal job of keeping me informed of the work and any challenges that developed with securing parts, as well as of any additional service work the car was due to have. I was pleasantly surprised at how effective the entire process was, and have to bite my tongue re: expected "dealership experiences". If you have to bring your car in for service to the dealership, I'd highly recommend Matt.

If I had to choose a less than favorable part of the overall experience, it'd have to be the shuttle service. Completely unorganized it seemed, and not very good at following up with customers (at least with me) concerning transport to/from the dealership.

Original - August 2013:
I just recently purchased a Hyundai Veloster Turbo from Tameron, and the experience was definitely a favorable one.  I had the opportunity to work with Mike Kelly, which turned out great.  From my initial, quite spontaneous interest in the car, to the test drive, to the eventual price haggling process, Mike presented himself professionally and factually throughout the entire experience.  He displayed a tremendous amount of respect for my desires with regards to the sale, we both managed to appreciate each other's role in the brief relationship, and we were both able to come to an agreement that both saved me an acceptable amount of expense and allowed Tameron to earn a profit from the purchase.  Mike was very forthcoming regarding his thoughts on the car, as well as advice for making the most of the transaction, and it was and is still very much appreciated and made the overall interaction much easier through which to navigate.  I'd definitely recommend seeking out his expertise if considering a car from Tameron Hyundai, or any car available through Tameron's services, in the near future.

name: Jana Whisenhunt
text: Brandon Crawley was my salesman, but was the first person I've ever dealt with buying cars, that truely broke the mold. No pressure to buy was ever felt and that was much appreciated. The team at Tameron Hyundai is awesome, and all were helpful in making it a pleasant experience. I will definately recommend them to my friends and visit them again, the next time I am ready to purchase a car.

name: Kristie Rankin
text: Great experience! Wonderful staff and fast service.

name: Matt Vinzant
text: This was my first experience shopping for a hyundai and I was very impressed with the customer service at Tameron.  Brandon and Mark were down to earth and friendly even staying after hours in order to help with all the features of my new veloster.

name: Bret Reaves
text: Great car dealership in Alabama.  Nathan Jordan is an excellent sales associate and very knowledgable about the cars here.

name: Renell Grantham
text: When I tell you that I was car shopping, understand that shopping is the key word. I test drove 9 different vehicles in the crossover class by every different manufacturer you can think of. I had a price in mind that I would spend and I was not going to spend a penny more. Since I was just shopping and did not have to have a new car. The ONLY place I visited more than once was Tameron Hyundai and that was thanks to my sales person Shannon ! She was amazing. Not pushy at all she just wanted to make sure that I understood everything about the cars that I drove and that I got the best pricing I could get. I walked away with everything I wanted in a car for exactly what my OTD price was. I bought a Santa Fe Sport 2.4 with every package you can add from SHANNON the best sales person on staff at Tamaron Hyundai.

resp.text: Ms. Grantham, we sure do appreciate you taking the time to review us! We love to hear that our customers enjoyed their experience with us! We hope you are enjoying your new Hyundai and give us a call or stop by if you need anything from us!! Thank you!!

name: Jan Parks
text: They've always taken great care of my car and will take me home or elsewhere if I don't want to wait.

name: felipe corral
text: Wait until your car brakes down see how good there powertrain  warranty really is. It is just a selling point. Buy somewhere else!

resp.text: Mr. Corral we are so sorry to hear about your car issue, please know a manager will be calling you soon to go over the warranty and see what we can do to help you!

name: Felicia Pascual
text: Great experience. Brandon and Adam were awesome at helping us get exactly what we needed!!

name: Huel Young
text: Tom is always very helpful with explanations to my questions, and the service was timely.

name: dphinis porter
text: I thank yall so much for everything ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

name: David Black
text:
My wife and I have just completed the purchase of a Genesis from Tameron Hyundai.  Contrary to the stereotypes many in the automotive sales profession have, we found Tameron's sales staff to be very helpful each time we stopped by, or contacted them for information.

What we appreciate probably the most is that we did not feel pressured to buy.  Whenever we had questions, they were answered, and phone calls were returned.

Eddie Sterling wound up being our main sales agent for the purchase, and we quickly understood why he has won awards for his sales expertise; his knowledge of the products was excellent.  He seemed genuinely interested in making sure that we were buying the right car for our preferences and needs, as opposed to just making a sale.  Other sales people and staff who helped us at different times were very nice to deal with, as well.

We would not hesitate to buy again from Tameron.

name: Paul Stephenson
text: Oil change good

text: Shannon was excellent and the service and attention to the particulars on closing the sale were outstanding. I would recommend her to anyone interested in buying from Tameron Hyundai.

text: I was interested in the Veloster, but they appeared to be hard to find in the Hoover area. I spoke with Eddie Sterling about what I wanted, color and all, and he was able to get it delivered promptly. They were very friendly at the dealership and went the extra mile to accomodate my request. I would send family and friends looking for a car to Tameron.

text: Matt in service was great.

My wife and I have just completed the purchase of a Genesis from Tameron Hyundai.  Contrary to the stereotypes many in the automotive sales profession have, we found Tameron's sales staff to be very helpful each time we stopped by, or contacted them for information.

name: Shannon Harris
text: My husband and I were initially looking for a used Azera to trade for my Acura as a attempt for lower payments. Jay Johnson showed us the new 2015 Sonata with more features than the Azera and we were sold. Jay was one of the best salesman we have ever encountered thus far. He was very professional and helped us from start to finish. Because it was raining on the day we purchased the car, I was able to come back and get it cleaned. Kudos to Jay and the staff. Great experience and I love my new Sonata!

name: Tommy Payson
text:
My wife and I went into the dealership with no real intent to buy but more to find what car we might want to look at more. As soon as we walked in, we immediately noticed the laid back and no pressure atmosphere of the dealership when we met our sales guy Davey P. He was very warm and personable and it was obvious that he wanted to understand our needs before trying to sell us something we did not want or a car out of our price range.

Davey grabbed some keys for a black Hyundai Tuscon that almost perfectly matched the description of what we were looking for and we went on a very enjoyable test drive with him. It was a very easy interaction and we did not feel pressured at all. My wife ended up not really liking the leather option on the car so instead of trying to upsell us, Davey immediately found another car with exactly what we asked and we were sold! Davey and the Tameron team worked very hard to make sure we were able to get the finances where we needed them to be and they were very thorough in the entire sales and financing process.

Overall, this was an excellent experience and Davey in particular really kept my wife and I interested in working with Tameron. We'll definitely be pointing our friends in Tameron's direction!!

name: Paul Stephenson
text: Oil change good

name: brian smith
text: I had just got off work and my appointment was later that morning for a recall problem. They got me right in and there were several other issues that he told me about. He told me what was an immediate issue and what could wait. I will return for future service. Monica Smith

name: Annette Burrell
text: I love coming to Tameron Hyundai in Hoover, Al. I'm always treated with the best customer service from sales to the General Manager. No other team I've experienced works harder for the customer than Tameron Hyundai!

name: Moses G
text: Staff is friendly not pushy trying to fast talk you into a deal

name: Xeta mancer
text: Mark Hodgson caught me at the door when I wandered in looking to expand my car search horizons.  He knew I couldn’t buy same day, but went that extra mile with me to educate me about a potential car I was interested in and he invested his time above and beyond to get me in a confident state of mind for my purchase.  Mark remained patient with me while I dealt with an superbly incompetent dealership service department (one Dewey Barber Chevrolet to be specific) over a dying, relatively young Chevy Cruze.  Despite all of those setbacks, on top of being a year out of bankruptcy, having no cash on hand for a down payment, and now being upside down in a financed car, Mark came through for me.  I’m stressing as my wedding and honeymoon are coming up and I have no vehicle to make these events happen and Mark assured me with a hundred percent confidence “You’re leaving here in a new car”, and he did not deceive!  I got a fair price and a reasonable payment on a brand new, 2018 Elantra with enough protections in place to give me peace of mind for the time I’ll be spending with my new ride.  I can genuinely call Mark a life saver, and my wedding plans aren’t ruined now because he stuck it out with me and helped me make my new car dream a reality.  Give Tameron Hyundai a shot and ask for Mark, you’ll be surprised at what these folks can make happen for you!

name: Wendy Trucks
text: Used car sales team and finance  team exceeded my expectations on buying a newer car....mark hodgson and walt lee made the experience amazing...i will be a repeat customer

name: Courtney Osborne
text: Thanks to Mike Kelly I am now driving around in a brand new Elantra!!  Mike took me on a course that let me try the car out on straight, curvy and highway roads.  He was also very knowledgeable about the specific features of the car.  This was helpful because he was able to tell me things that I wouldn't have even known to ask.  After we got back I knew that I was ready to drive this new car home.  The process of trading in my old car and purchasing the new one was made super easy.  Everything from beginning to end was explained to me and made me feel very comfortable.  Before driving off the lot Mike helped me set my phone up through bluetooth so I could talk handsfree.  He also showed me how to use all of the features/buttons in the car in a way that easy to understand.

resp.text: The Elantra is a great car with all the bells and whistles in a compact, super chic style!  We are glad that you enjoyed buying your vehicle with us! We hope to service all of your automotive needs in the future. Thanks!

name: Belinda Brennan
text: Quick, polite, courteous and efficient.

name: Aaron Pinhas
text:
Unbelievable pack of dirtbags.

I reached an agreement on price and terms on a car over the phone and said I'd be there in 20 min with a check. I was called back a mere 2 min later and told the car was already sold to someone else.  Over the next week and a half or so, I was called no fewer than 7 times by 5 different employees of the dealership alternately telling me the car was still available and that the car had been sold but that there was another one they wanted to show me.  I had someone else do an online chat during which he negotiated, in written email communication, the exact same price I'd been quoted originally.  I went in the next day, check in hand, only to be told that the price was now $1000 higher and was absolutely firm.

Needless to say, I walked out and won't be returning.  If they felt they could make more profit selling to someone else, they should have simply said so upfront instead of jerking me around for nearly two weeks and then trying to bleed me for more money.  What a colossal waste of my time and a clear demonstration of the utter lack of respect these clowns have for their customers.

resp.text:
Mr. Pinhas, thank you for taking the time to review us online- Unfortunately, you had a disappointing experience with us. It might not surprise you to hear we now have a new General Manager, Rob Gallik, who understands and wants every customers to have a wonderful experience here! I apologize that we weren't able to assist you and make shopping more of a pleasure and less stressful experience. We still hope that we can change your mind about us. If you ever need anything automotive wise in the future, we hope that you could consider coming to the new Tameron and letting us show you something very different.

Thanks again for reaching out, please give us a call if we can ever change your mind!

name: Ayman Farag
text: It was great experience, all were professional and helpful.

name: Michelle James
text: The service professionals were very nice and informative.

name: D C
text: Great customer service 👍

name: Steven Ford
text: Love this place!! Fast service!

name: frank hester
text: Marcus was helpful in finding the car we wanted and the process of purchasing it

name: Mike Coop
text: Visited Tameron Hyundai recently to take a look at a Santa Fe for my wife. We were greeted by Daniel Pereira, we let him know this was our first time looking at the Santa Fe and we were just looking today. He asked us a few questions about what was important in a car to us and then said he had one in mind that my wife my like. He pulled it out front and my wife immediately feel in love. We began talking numbers but were never persured. We had our one year old and three old with us but they made them feel at home supplying balloons and snacks. Within two hours my wife was pulling off the lot in her brand new Santa Fe. Eveyone at Tameron treated us with respect and curiosity and Daniel went out of his way to take care of us before and after we purchased the vehicle.

name: Anola Schulz
text: Was pleased with my service.

name: Jim Powell
text:
The only positive thing I can say about purchasing a used car here is I learned all the ways you can get screwed by a used car salesman.

I brought in two used cars and bought two "newer" used vehicles. I"ll be up front, I made every stupid decision you could buying a used car. The Yukon my wife wanted had a little difficulty starting (that was my first warning sign I failed to heed). When I asked the salesman he just brushed it off as it hadn't been turned on that day (my second warning sign).

When we got into the room for negotiations I told him upfront what my requirements were. He then (what I later learned is a typical salesman trick) went to "argue" with his boss about giving me the deal I wanted. After a few hours he finally invited me back to his "bosses" office to sign the deal.

When I sat down to sign, he handed me a stack of papers that I spent some time reviewing. I honestly could not make sense of the numbers. When I started asking him about them he responded, "I thought we were here to buy a car!" (my final warning sign I failed to heed). I caved to this high pressure sales tactic and just wanted to get out of there as quick as possible as it had already been 4+ hours. When I finally got my vehicles they said it took so long because they had to "clean" them. Worst cleaning job ever.

The NEXT day the Yukon I bought died in a parking lot. I should have taken it back and got my Expedition back I traded in but I felt like I had to make do with what I bought (besides, I bought the warranty!) Took it to a local repair shop and sure enough the fuel pump needed to be replaced. Lucky for me, I only had to pay the $100 deductible!

Less than a year into owning the vehicle, the transmission went out. Fortunately for me I again ONLY had to pay the $100 deductible to replace the transmission. Little did I know, transmissions tend to go bad again after they go out the first time. About a year later, the transmission went out a second time! That was the final straw, so I traded it in at Driver's Way where I had a MUCH better experience.

Now, my second car I mentioned I bought that same time along with the Yukon ended up having a broken motor mount and the A/C compressor went out less than a year after purchase. Both vehicles were only 3-5 years used and less than 75k miles on them. Maybe I just had terrible luck from Tameron Hyundai but I can't help but feel they knew about these issues and just passed them on to me based on their sales practices.

Tameron Hyundai lives by the moto "Caveat emptor"... Lesson learned. Never again.

name: Jennifer Mulkey
text: I didn't even realize I was looking for a new car. My sales advisor Shannon was awesome

name: Angela Hatfield
text: They did a great job on all they did.

text: Great1 was told of recall, I didn't know about.and they fixed it the same day.Thank ou for being .A great company!

text: Called for service of my vehicle, and the lady who answered needed my VIN. I said I would be right back to get the VIN and she immediately hung up on me. Rude! I am taking my business elsewhere.

text: Great Service! Professional

name: Linda Millek
text:
I worked with an AmaZing saleswoman by the name of Shannon Cowart, at Tameron Hyundai who is hands-down the BEST, most helpful and professional salesperson I have ever experienced working with.  I do not make this statement lightly as I was married to the owner of a dealership in Michigan for 20 yrs. and trained personally with numerous salespersons over the course of that time.  Shannon answered all of my questions and for the very first time in my over 40 plus yrs. as a licensed driver and vehice owner,  had someone go over every detail explaining it's function bumper to bumper.

Thank you Shannon and Tameron Hyundai for making my purchase and selection such a delightful experience.  They even had to contact another dealer and coordinate delivery of the color and option package that I desired.  I love my new Veloster and will most certainly be returning for service.

Linda L. Millek

name: eai13
text: TAMERON HYUNDAI is AMAZING!!! I genuinely cant express just how amazed and grateful I am to them. About 4 months ago I financed my first ever car. I am in my mid-twenties and was in desperate need for a vehicle (at least a reliable one lol). I had always had a hand-me down car or bought one from out of somebody's driveway. So when it came time for me to want to BUY an actual car, Tameron Hyundai was the ONLY dealership that could help me out. I spent an entire week going to different dealerships all over the Birmingham area. It was Ridiculous how every place turned me away because I didn't have $8,000 down, or an established credit line, or just lazy sales people who could care less to help a young man/single parent out. When I finally got to Tameron they blew me away with what seemed like the red-carpet treatment lol. They were friendly, knowledgeable, and committed to making sure that I drove away in a new whip. The sales managers Larry Keene and Rob Galik worked their tails off to get me a new ride WITH an warranty. They even gave me options on which ride I wanted, all of which had an affordable payment. On-top of that, they even made my lil girl a balloon and got her a coke when she was thirsty:) They went to bat, looked out for me, and got me the ride I needed. My sales person even calls to check up on me and my car; I bought it 4 months ago lol. I couldn't recommend these guys any higher. Its nice to know that I can count on that for the next 20 years, ALL of my vehicles will come from Tameron Hyundai :)

text: Just didn't think they were really wanting to help my mom get in a car. So we went to McKinnon Nissan and they put my mom in a car.

name: Alexander Bloom
text:
Tameron’s sales and finance professionals are top notch and they stand by their products whether you are buying a new or used vehicle.  My story didn’t begin with a five star experience but it ended with one.
I purchased a used Tucson at a great price.  My salesman, Nick Foster took care of us and got us through negotiations without any hiccups.  We got what we asked for with minimal resistance.  Tim Provost, in finance, processed the paperwork and made us feel comfortable throughout the process.  All was well.  9 days after our purchase we were informed by Tim that the car had been wrecked and repaired prior to our purchase.  Not the best thing you want to hear, but let me tell you how refreshing it is to deal with the team like Hyundai who make integrity and honesty a priority in their day-to-day.  The wreck was not on Carfax or Autocheck so no harm no foul.  They purchased their car back with no penalties imposed on myself.  Still though, I was ready to walk away.
One of the owners, Rob Gallik, learned of what had happened and met with me personally.  I was very impressed with this alone.  He apologized for the inconvenience and offered us several options if we were still interested in buying with them.  His personal touch and a great deal (we think) put us in a new car that day (Sonata).  Our salesman on the new car side was Daniel Pereira.  Great guy!  Very mellow and we did not feel pressured with him during our time together.  Really we felt no pressure to take any deal at all but Rob’s offer was hard to refuse.
Overall I rate these guys a perfect score because of the way we felt after the ordeal was over.  Our two week long relationship was a bit strenuous at times but they came through in the end treating us like family (the kind you like).  Thanks Nick, Tim, Rob, and Dan.  I look forward to seeing you guys again.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear that we were able to work everything out to your liking! Thank you for taking the time to review us, we appreciate your business! Please let us know if you have any questions!

name: Von Spradlin
text:
Look... All these bad reviews seem to come from the same type of people.... People expecting the same type of deals people with 750 credit scores get while having, terrible or no credit themselves.

My wife and I were able to get a 2010 dodge caravan with less than a 1000 dollars down and a recent repossession on our record.   Yes we paid about 2000 dollars more than I wanted to,  but there was no other place we were going to get any vehicle comparable without putting down 2000 dollars or more.

Bottom line is this,  if you have bad credit this may be the best place in Birmingham Alabama to get a decent late model vehicle without a massively large down payment.   Yes you will pay more than you may like, but  it will definitely help you get back on track credit wise.

name: Alex Tedrow

We are very sorry we purchased a car from them.  After driving the car for a couple of days the  check engine light came on.  So we had an oil change thinking this would help, no such luck!!! Then we drove the car out of town and it broke down on the interstate, dang!!  We had to put a new alternator on it, along with the cost of the wrecker.  Now the modulator is going bad.

This company sucks to the third degree.!!!!!!

M&T

name: Bill Hill
text: Very very very slow. Had papers where I PAID for Lifetime tire rotation and balance. I presented papers prior to service and the employee looked at the receipt as if he had never seen a Walmart receipt before. After he finally accepted the receipt he told me to park my car and bring him the keys. I did as instructed and went inside to wait. I was never called when my car was ready. I noticed that the car was complete and I went to the service desk to claim my car. At that time I was questioned by three employees and a Manager as to the receipt I had on the lifetime balance and rotation. They did not want to see the receipt but questioned me as to how i got the receipt. This must have been because of very poor training of all involved.  I have a 13 year old Grandson far more competent than the employees I dealt with. I am 70 1/2 years old and I could have completed the job in half the time it took.

text: Man was rude to me. I really don't know why!

text: These people have no sense of urgency. Was quoted 30 minutes for a tired repair. More than an hour later they came to tell me they would be unable to do the repair. Slow and entirely unhelpful. Will make the drive, even with a damaged tire, to a reputable, efficient place next time.

name: Adonis Medallo
text: I would like to thanks all the people working there for their kindness and great services.

name: Koju Celeste
text: A year ago,I had to get my oil change before I headed back home to Tennessee and so I chose somewhere quick so I could head home faster and not have to worry about getting my oil changed when I got home to Tennessee. I went to Walmart and the service was alright,no flaws or anything. And from there,I headed straight to Tennessee and as I was driving home,I smelled burning oil,but I thought it was just a little bit that burns just as usual. Now mind you,my home was 3 hours away from Sumiton Alabama. When I got home,I looked under the hood and they left my oil cap off and my whole engine was drenched in oil! (To this day,I’m still replacing ignition coils that have been misfiring and still find oil in the spark plugs) Luckily,the oil cap was still sitting where they had left it. Every time I get an oil change,no matter where I go,I look under the hood to make sure they’ve got it on there.

name: Jerry Caradine
text: Very disappointed with the management staff in today's trip. According to the employees which were very understaffed, all management was scheduled off and there were only 2 people scheduled in the shop. The 1 cashier that did work there quit yesterday because she was not allowed off today. The backup cashier there to help didn't have access to any of the systems which defeated the purpose. The 2 shop personnel kept having to stop to answer calls or write up tickets. This wasn't allowing any work to get completed. Fortunately I had trailer tires with me that I could leave and come back for later. Otherwise it was going to be a 2 hour wait. For 2 tires! Again this wasn't on the people there in the shop as they were as nice as can be about it. This came down to poor management decisions. Unfortunately, the employees will be the ones to pay the price with the rude customers that will become annoyed at the time things take today.

text: Some kid help me. Looked like he just blazed out back. When I gave him the vin number and type of car he kept asking if that was the part I needed. I dont know is it? Two older gentlemen who were obviously more experienced were right next to us and didnt bother to help. We were obviously having issues. I ended up returning both parts

resp.text: Shana, we are sorry to hear that your experience with our team member hasn't been up to par. We hope we can change this in the future! Thanks for the training opportunity your feedback provides. - O'Reilly Auto Parts

name: Clint Eaves
text: Greg the assistant manager is amazing. He was super helpful throughout the entire process. Had to make at least 4 trips back and fourth to get everything I needed for my jeep. I came here from out of town and needed a lot of help to get my truck running and they helped with everything. Great customer service. Would recommend this place to everybody. Great job from these guys.

name: Shari Quinn
text: Need a smog check? Go here and hope you get Ricky. He's incredibly efficient and probably one of the nicest guys you'll meet. I got in at 5:45, and was out the door, paperwork submitted to the DMV and all, at 6 pm on the dot.

name: Kimberly Rogers
text: My go to guys. Honest and fairly priced. Real Daly City fixture! Fast and reliable, they'll even keep you occupied laughing if you're waiting for your vehicle to finish.

name: Joshua Kesling
text: The guys that work here go above and beyond. They did a fantastic job with me. Helped me for over an hour and asked nothing in return- fantastic staff and I highly recommend them for all of your automotive parts needs.

text: My battery died today and needed to be replaced. It was still under warranty from the business i purchased it at, but they gave me a hard time and gave me bad information. At Oreillys, the man who tested my battery today was literally the only person who was not dismissive and did not talk down to me.Regret not getting his name when i was there today, but i appreciated his help very much. I will be a return customer for sure.

name: Jessica Howard
text: We were going down the highway near Birmingham and had a blowout on our motorhome,  we called Action Tire Co. And they had a tire for us delivered to them by the time we got to the shop. Then they had us fixed and secure and back on the road in no time. I gave this company 5 stars and I'd give them 10 if I could. Gil and Sam took care of us I feel so very blessed. If your in this area and need tires for your truck or motorhome this is the place to go!

resp.text: Jessica, having a blow out on the highway is never a fun experience, and we're glad you all were safe. It was our pleasure helping you out quickly, and it's great to hear Gil and Sam led the way the whole time. We hope you've been well over the last few months, and we'll be here if you're ever in the area and in need of our services. -The team at Action Tire Company - Birmingham

name: Cory Nabors
text: These guys are great! I have been using these guys for all my wheel and tire needs and they come through every time. Price, service, expertise, and quality that can't be beat. Call them now!

resp.text: Cory, making sure our customers wheels are in wheelie great shape is the name of the game here. It's awesome to know our team has come through for you any time you needed us, and we appreciate that you trust us to get the job done right every time. You know we'll continue to be here ready to tackle any other tire issues you might need help with whenever you need us. -The team at Action Tire Company - Birmingham

text: Erased Last Post,  Because of a Miscommunication,  over the phone.  Monday 6/29/20, Started Off Bad, but at the End of the day,  Action Tire was There and came through,  and Even Discounted Them More then Original Price over the Phone., Thank You Action Tire.

text: 2 hours from home on I-65 I blow out a tire on the outskirts of Birmingham.  I find Action Tire on a Google search.    One hour later I have the tire of my choice installed right there in the emergency lane of I-65 for a reasonable price and I’m on my way!   Highly recommend!

text: Great guys and very polite. They made replacing the tires on our customers crane a breeze. I would recommend them to any one.

text: They have great customer service, reasonable prices, and do more than get the job done. I hate I moved to Tennessee and now I have to find a new mechanic shop. It's hard to find honest people in the automotive business today and they set the bar high. Thanks Grandview for meeting the needs of the community!!

text: Jim and Chris do a great job.  They are not the cheapest around, but they do good, quality work.  A few years ago, they installed a Jasper engine in my Dodge Ram pickup truck.  I drove it several more years before I sold it.  I haven't had anything serviced there in awhile as I have been blessed with no mechanical issues, but I wouldn't hesitate to use them.

name: Mark
text:
I was having problems with my 2014 Dodge 6.7 diesel.  Stopped at City Diesel while traveling from Kentucky to Florida.  They are normally very busy but they got me in the shop and back on the road in just a few hours.  Highly recommend this company if you want top notch work.  My turbo actuator is working perfectly now since it was replaced. The truck pulls great and the exhaust brake works better than ever.
Big thanks to the crew at City Diesel!!

name: James Scarbrough
text: Quality work done in a timely manner.

name: John Blankenship
text: Awesome company to do business with..highly recommend

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback! Let us know if we can do anything to help you.

name: John Bell II
text:
Outstanding work done on my 6.0, Bennett Clark, called and explained what work was done. He is very knowledgeable and explained my engine and it's repair in understandable terms.
I have been doing business with City Diesel since 1999, they know Diesel engines! They are very honest and reliable , great mechanical business. I can not say enough about them being trustworthy and reputable, I highly recommend City Diesel.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.  We do appreciate hearing back from our customers.  I'll let Bennett know you were pleased.

name: Jane Smith
text: Were supposed to do an entire motor rebuild and instead replaced very few parts new resulting in an engine failure .. terrible costumer service.. just a plain rip off

resp.text: Jane Smith, is that the name you did business with us under?  I do not have any record of any transaction and we keep great records.  On the off chance that this is a real review under a pseudonym we keep excellent records and have a good warranty policy and any engine repair we did would be covered by warranty.   I would be happy to sit down with you and go over what was replaced and what warranty options you have.  Of course this would require this to be a legitimate review that has actually done business with us. Having only 3 reviews all of them one star and hundreds if not thousands of miles apart seems suspicious.  In the future I would recommend a more convincing fake name and maybe use a different profile for reviews in New York  and Alabama when you are leaving fictitious reviews.

name: Nicfin36
text: Jay did an awesome job fabricating a metal hydraulic line for my tractor. Top notch work. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We always enjoy feedback good or bad but it's especially nice to hear when we do a good job
